page.title: 13Pye corner farm cont.
page.content: Pye Corner farm sells and grows, beef cows when they're fat enough, wheat, barley (was used to make dog food in 1984) and potatoes. Pye corner farm was once a small cottage with two rooms upstairs and two rooms downstairs. It has ten barns and sheds,one big barn, one dairy parlour, two cattle sheds, five storage sheds and one barn which they hardly use. They buy 3 tons of cattle cake in the winter. They have 1 pet cat and 5 working cats. They used to have lots of dogs, but they all got run over on the main road, out side the farm. They make 30 tons of beef a year. Mrs Hodder used to like making dairy products, but they had to stop because the cattle were dying of a disease. They have 4 tractors,1 combine harvester, 1 forager, 1 mower, 2 big trailers, 1 bail maker, {(cont. p.15)
